Package.description: e-SignLive for Salesforce enables Salesforce users to send out documents for signature, monitor e-signing transactions and file e-signed documents from and into Salesforce.com with the click of a button. No more chasing signatures, with e-SignLive for Salesforce, we make it easier to obtain secure, legal and compliant e-signatures for contracts, purchase orders, and other highly sensitive documents for regulated business processes.
